name: porcelain
content:

a hard but delicate, shiny, white substance made by heating a special type of clay to a high temperature, used to make cups, plates, decorations, etc.: a porcelain dish The tea cups are (made of) porcelain.
mikroman6/Moment/GettyImages
cups, plates, and decorations, etc. made of porcelain: He had a fine collection of Meissen porcelain.
